name: Amit Mondal
body:
**Name :** Amit Mondal **Address :** Village : Gournagar, P.O. : Kabilpur, District : Birbhum **Support Period :** Beneficiary since 2016 **Mentor :** Sandip Saha (Geological Studies Unit, Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata) **Educational Backgroud :** Madhyamik : 91.6% ; Higher Secondary : 84.6%  **Present Course :** Chemistry (UG I), Suri Vidyasagar College

Amit comes from the village of Gournagar in the Mohammad Bazar area of Birbhum district. His father is a small farmer with a meagre income barely enough to sustain a family of five. Due to their poor economic condition Amit had to stay at his uncle’s place to continue his studies. In spite of all adversities, he scored 85% in his Higher Secondary Examinations and subsequently joined Suri Vidyasagar College in 2016 to study  Chemistry. Srijan Sujan will assist him in his journey.

_To view the academic documents of Amit Mondal please download the zip file or the tar file from the link the top._
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
